SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R.cst_ord_id desc) AS rowindex, r.cst_ord_id, MAX(R.SUBSCRIBE_ID) SUBSCRIBE_ID, MAX(r.CUST_NAME_CHINESE) CUST_NAME_CHINESE, MAX(r.APPLY_ORD_ID) APPLY_ORD_ID, MAX(r.APPLY_ORD_NAME) APPLY_ORD_NAME, MAX(r.ACTIVE_TYPE) ACTIVE_TYPE, MAX(r.SERVICE_ID) SERVICE_ID, MAX(r.ACTIVETYPENAME) ACTIVETYPENAME, MAX(r.SERVICETYPE) SERVICETYPE, MAX(r.ORDERTYPENAME) ORDERTYPENAME, MAX(r.ORDER_TYPE) ORDER_TYPE, MAX(r.SYSTEM_RESOURCE) SYSTEM_RESOURCE, MAX(r.resources) resources, MIN(r.req_fin_date) req_fin_date, listagg(r.ORDER_ID, ',') within group(order by r.ORDER_ID) AS ORDER_IDS, listagg(r.SRV_ORD_ID, ',') within group(order by r.SRV_ORD_ID) AS SRV_ORD_IDS, RTRIM(XMLAGG(XMLPARSE(CONTENT r.SERIAL_NUMBER ||',' WELLFORMED) ORDER BY r.srv_ord_id).GETCLOBVAL(), ',') AS SERIAL_NUMBER, RTRIM(XMLAGG(XMLPARSE(CONTENT r.ATTR_VALUE || ',' WELLFORMED) ORDER BY r.ATTR_VALUE).GETCLOBVAL(), ',') AS CIRCODE, RTRIM(XMLAGG(XMLPARSE(CONTENT r.DISPATCH_ORDER_NO || ',' WELLFORMED) ORDER BY r.CST_ORD_ID).GETCLOBVAL(), ',') AS DISPATCH_ORDER_NO, RTRIM(XMLAGG(XMLPARSE(CONTENT r.DISPATCH_TITLE || ',' WELLFORMED) ORDER BY r.CST_ORD_ID).GETCLOBVAL(), ',') AS DISPATCH_TITLE, CASE WHEN dbms_lob.getlength(RTRIM(XMLAGG(XMLPARSE(CONTENT r.TACHE_NAME || ',' WELLFORMED) ORDER BY r.CST_ORD_ID).GETCLOBVAL(), ',')) = 0 THEN '已下发本地调度' ELSE to_char(RTRIM(XMLAGG(XMLPARSE(CONTENT r.TACHE_NAME || ',' WELLFORMED) ORDER BY r.CST_ORD_ID).GETCLOBVAL(), ',')) END AS TACHE_NAME FROM ( SELECT cst.cst_ord_id, cst.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, cst.SUBSCRIBE_ID, cst.APPLY_ORD_ID, cst.APPLY_ORD_NAME, srv.ACTIVE_TYPE, CIO.CODE_CONTENT AS ACTIVETYPENAME, CI.CODE_CONTENT AS SERVICETYPE, FO.CODE_CONTENT as ORDERTYPENAME, srv.SERVICE_ID, srv.ORDER_TYPE, srv.SYSTEM_RESOURCE, srv.resources, srv.SERIAL_NUMBER, srv.SRV_ORD_ID, SRV.ORDER_ID, ATTR.ATTR_VALUE, dis.DISPATCH_ORDER_NO, dis.DISPATCH_TITLE, ord.req_fin_date, CASE WHEN srv.SRV_ORD_STAT = '10C' THEN '申请人拟稿' WHEN srv.SRV_ORD_STAT = '10F' THEN '已完成' WHEN srv.SRV_ORD_STAT = '10X' THEN '撤单/作废' WHEN srv.SRV_ORD_STAT = '10N' THEN (SELECT to_char(wm_concat(distinct ut.Tache_Name)) FROM gom_order ord LEFT JOIN gom_wo wo ON wo.order_id = ord.order_id LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S ws ON ws.id = wo.ps_id LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE ut ON ut.id = ws.tache_id WHERE (ORD.ORDER_ID = SRV.ORDER_ID OR ORD.PARENT_ORDER_ID = SRV.ORDER_ID ) AND WO.WO_STATE = '290000002' AND WO.DISP_OBJ_ID != '-2000') END AS TACHE_NAME FROM gom_bdw_cst_ord cst LEFT JOIN gom_bdw_srv_ord_info srv ON srv.cst_ord_id = cst.cst_ord_id LEFT JOIN gom_order ord ON ord.order_id = srv.order_id LEFT JOIN gom_bdw_dispatch_order dis ON dis.cst_ord_id = cst.cst_ord_id AND DIS.STATE = '10A' AND DIS.DISPATCH_SOURCE = 'second' LEFT JOIN (SELECT SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_VALUE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO WHERE ATTR_CODE = '20000064') ATTR ON ATTR.SRV_ORD_ID = srv.SRV_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO CI ON SRV.SERVICE_ID = CI.CODE_VALUE AND CI.CODE_TYPE = 'product_code' LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO CIO ON SRV.ACTIVE_TYPE = CIO.CODE_VALUE AND CIO.CODE_TYPE = 'operate_type' LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO FO ON SRV.ORDER_TYPE = FO.CODE_VALUE AND FO.CODE_TYPE = 'order_type' WHERE srv.SYSTEM_RESOURCE = 'second-schedule-lt'
and cst.APPLY_ORD_ID like '%'|| #{applyOrdId}||'%'
and cst.CUST_NAME_CHINESE like '%'||#{custName}||'%'
and cst.SUBSCRIBE_ID like '%'||#{subscribeId}||'%'
and srv.SERVICE_ID = #{productType}
and srv.ACTIVE_TYPE =#{actType}
and ATTR.ATTR_VALUE like '%'||#{cirNum}||'%'
and SRv.SERIAL_NUMBER like '%'||#{serialNumber}||'%'
and SRv.ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType}
and srv.TRADE_ID like '%'||#{tradeId}||'%'
and DIS.DISPATCH_ORDER_NO like '%'|| #{dispatchOrderId}||'%'
AND ATTR.REQ_FIN_DATE BETWEEN to_date( #{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND srv.SRV_ORD_STAT=#{srvOrdStat}
AND cst.HANDLE_DEP_ID IN ( SELECT ORG_ID FROM GOM_ORG_S START WITH ORG_ID = (SELECT ORG_ID FROM GOM_ORG_S A WHERE A.PARENT_ORG_ID = 1 START WITH A.ORG_ID = (SELECT ORG_ID FROM GOM_USER_S WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) CONNECT BY PRIOR A.PARENT_ORG_ID = A.ORG_ID) CONNECT BY PARENT_ORG_ID = PRIOR ORG_ID ) ORDER BY CST_ORD_ID DESC ) r GROUP BY r.cst_ord_id
